aboutP1.message: The extension develops as my hobby, i'll be glad of any support.

aboutP2.message: This non-profit project, the author does not receive a financial benefit from it. It is constantly being improved, making your life easier and give more opportunities for favorite activities.

aboutP3.message: Many thanks to all who support the extension.

cloudDesc.message: The cloud synchronization function is in test mode. Before using, save a copy of the data to JSON.

cloudReplaceSure.message: Current data will be completely replaced with data from the cloud. Are you sure?

cloudStorageEmpty.message: Sync is not possible! There is no data in the cloud!

cloudUploadfailed.message: Sync is not possible! The weight of the store exceeds the permissible limit in the cloud.

dataEmpty.message: JS and CSS fields are empty

description.message: User JavaScript and CSS on any website

jsonInstructions.message: You can download current storage as JSON and restore it later. Warning! Before restore, all current data will be removed!

libsDescription.message: You can add custom libraries from internet for own JavaScript rules. Position in table defines priority to execute. First libraries starts first.

noSites.message: No sites right now. To add first site press "Add new" button there or in extension popup on any website.

notSaved.message: You have unsaved changes which will not be saved

onLoadJson.message: All current data will be removed! Are you sure?

resetMsg.message: Remove all current data and set basic settings.

stopPage.message: Looks like this page cannot be modified :(

urlTip.message: You can use the asterix (*) to create masks and enter multiple values separated by commas. For example:
